title: Python Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of Python including variables, data types, and basic operations.

title: Control Structures
description: Master loops, conditionals, and control flow in Python.

title: Data Structures
description: Learn about lists, dictionaries, tuples, and sets.

title: Functions
description: Learn about defining and using functions, parameters, return values, and scope.

title: Object-Oriented Programming
description: Master classes, objects, inheritance, and encapsulation in Python.

title: File Handling
description: Learn to read from and write to files in Python.

title: Error Handling
description: Master try-except blocks and exception handling.

title: String Methods
description: Learn powerful string manipulation techniques and formatting.

title: Modules & Packages
description: Master modular programming and Python's standard library.

title: List Comprehensions
description: Learn powerful list creation techniques and comprehensions.

title: Regular Expressions
description: Master pattern matching and text processing with regex.
